content.question: In the last paragraph, the author discusses “another abode in the same neighbourhood” in order to

choices.label: suggest that any shortcomings in the project may have been due to inadequate funding
argue that the project would have been more pleasing if the workers had been more skillful
describe the improvements that could be made in the future to make the project successful
concede that a poorly conceived project can still provide a benefit to those involved

content.answer: concede that a poorly conceived project can still provide a benefit to those involved

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
